item.title: About
item.description: This site only serves as a basic example of Hugo with Ananke theme.

item.title: Hugo Ship Boarding
item.description: Having ruled out Wordpress due to it’s export/import promote mechanics, pivoted to Hugo and applied the Ananke theme simply because it was the most common and included in the Quickstart guide. Many of the Hugo commands in different tutorials are incorrect, so a level of guessing was required to get the basics working, only to find the good stuff is in the ananke/exampleSite directory. hugo new site quickstart cd quickstart cp ananke/exampleSite/_index.
